helpText: Š_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________č.

generic.title: Š_Error updating categories__________________________č
generic.message: Š_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________č.

maxDepthExceeded.title: Š_Error updating categories__________________________č
maxDepthExceeded.message: Š_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________č.

destinationHasSameName.title: Š_Error updating categories__________________________č
destinationHasSameName.message: Š_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________č.

noSchema.title: Š_Schema not found_________________č
noSchema.message: Š_Item schema not found for user_________________č.

maxCharacter.title: Š_Error updating categories__________________________č
maxCharacter.message: Š_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________č.

deleteInUseCategory.title: Š_Delete category________________č
deleteInUseCategory.message: Š_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________č.

custom.title: Š_Custom categories__________________č
custom.message: Š_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________č.

arcgis.title: Š_ArcGIS categories__________________č
arcgis.message: Š_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________č.

iso.title: Š_ISO categories_______________č
iso.message: Š_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________č.

inspire.title: Š_INSPIRE categories___________________č
inspire.message: Š_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________č.
